review: It's pretty cool, but it does have some issues, one of them being flaky WiFi. I read the cable is the antenna, so I bought an 8-inch HDMI extension cable and that made WiFi access much more reliable. It won't play AVI files, but MP4 and MKV play just fine. That's all I've used it for, so I cannot comment on its other capabilities. If your WiFi access point is in another room, get an 8-inch HDMI extension cable; otherwise you will hate this thing.
